short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly generate and find the right placeholder image for work!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find the right placeholder image for your project
- Generate simple and customised placeholder images
- Search for the royalty free images through four famous website: Pixabay, Pexels, Unsplash, Picjumbo

Generate a list of URLs for images you choose with different sizes on the website
- Simply right click on the image and choose "Show Image URL"
